- votre nom et prénom.
Hiba❄️

urls.title: Notice of your rights in case of flight delays, cancellations and denied boarding | easyJet
urls.description: Notice of your rights in case of flight delays, cancellations and denied boarding This notice contains important information about your rights established by European regulation (EC) No.261/2004 / the Air Passenger Rights and Air Travel Organisers’ Licencing (Amendment) (EU Exit) Regulations 2019, and applies to you if: You have a confirmed booking on a flight operated by easyJet UK Limited, easyJet Europe Airline GmbH or easyJet Switzerland S.A. purchased at a fare available directly or indirectly to the

data.text: @JoanneC93507131 Hi Joanne, I am sorry about your experience, please DM us your booking reference, email address used to make the booking and the booker's name. Once I have received it, I will look into this for you. Thanks, Ireesa 🦋
